# :green_book: Readme.md

1. Install packages

   ```bash
   npm i -D vite
   
   npm i three
   ```

   

2. Run the development server

   ```bash
   npm start
   ```

   

3. Build(create files for deployment)

   ```bash
   npm run build
   ```
